articles.author: Kathryn  Watson, Eleanor  Watson
articles.title: Federal government to take ownership stake in Trilogy Metals, which has Alaskan mining claims - CBS News
articles.description: Interior Secretary Doug Burgum said the "ownership in that company will benefit the American people."
articles.content: Washington — The federal government will acquire a 10% stake in a Canadian-based company that has mining claims in remote northwestern Alaska, Interior Secretary Doug Burgum and the White House annou… [+2001 chars]
